# HashTable.lookup_extended method

```csharp
public static bool lookup_extended(IntPtr hash_table, IntPtr lookup_key, out IntPtr orig_key, 
    out IntPtr value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| hash_table | Transfer ownership: none |
| lookup_key | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| orig_key | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |
| value | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |

## Return Value
